mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_subscriber_result(test_id, message_id, topic_id, subscription_type, subscription_id, subscription_publish_time, subscription_arrival_time, subscriber_arrival_time, pull_options, created_at) VALUES(#{testId}, #{messageId}, #{topicId}, #{subscriptionType}, #{subscriptionId}, #{subscriptionPublishTime}, #{subscriptionArrivalTime}, #{subscriberArrivalTime}, #{pullOptions}, #{createdAt})
INSERT INTO test_topic_result(test_id, message_id, topic_id, topic_arrival_time, topic_publish_time) VALUES (#{testId}, #{messageId}, #{topicId}, #{topicArrivalTime}, #{topicPublishTime})
